description: Lists the tags that have been added to the specified resource. This operation is supported in storage gateways of all types.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource for which you want to list tags.

nested_items.name: ResourceARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource for which you want to list tags.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An opaque string that indicates the position at which to stop returning the list of tags.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: An array that contains the tags for the specified resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: Tag key. The key can't start with aws:.
